block.name: Char To Float
block.doc: Converts a stream from char (byte) data type to float (real) data type.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.

param.name: Scale
param.doc: Sets the scaling factor of the output value. The default value of 1 will give 0 => 0.0, 1 => 1.0, 2 => 2.0, ..., 255 => 255.0. If it is desired to normalize the value to 1.0, enter 256.0
